products.name: tetraweed
products.description: "TETRAWEED: In the Heart of Turbulence, A Golden Prospect" is a provocative artwork featuring a bold, black wooden tetrahedron housing a gold-painted tumbleweed. In this piece, the humble tumbleweed casts away its desolate symbolism, instead, embodying splendor and potential. The golden tumbleweed nestled within the geometric form, underscores the transformation from survival to significance against odds. This intricate interplay between tetrahedron and tumbleweed explores existence's dualities - stability vs chaos, darkness vs light, rejection vs recognition.
bulletPoints: Wood, Black Paint, Tumbleweed, Gold Paint
